explanation: [0-0] A young boy sits at a table in the kitchen, wearing an orange T-shirt. The table is piled high with various chocolates, he holds a chocolate bar in his hand, and his face and hands are covered in chocolate. The background is a modern kitchen, with blue cabinets and white tiled walls behind the boy. A decorative painting with a fruit pattern hangs on the wall.

[0-3] The little boy can be seen shaking his head as he eats the chocolate bar, looking up to his left. The camera zooms in on the boy's face. He continues to eat the chocolate bar, his face smeared with chocolate, looking down at the chocolate bar in his hand.

[0-3] The little boy can be seen shaking his head as he eats the chocolate bar, looking up to his left. The camera zooms in on the boy's face. He continues to eat the chocolate bar, his face smeared with chocolate, looking down at the chocolate bar in his hand.

[0-3] The little boy can be seen shaking his head as he eats the chocolate bar, looking up to his left. The camera zooms in on the boy's face. He continues to eat the chocolate bar, his face smeared with chocolate, looking down at the chocolate bar in his hand.

[3-9] Suddenly, a woman appears in the picture, walking from the left side of the picture to behind the little boy. Wearing a yellow top, she is astonished to see the boy and her mouth drops open. The woman bends down, her expression turning serious. Then she reaches out and snatches the chocolate bar that the boy is about to put in his mouth. The boy froze in place, awkwardly scratching his right cheek with his hand, then covering his right eye with his chocolate-covered right hand and lowering his head. By this time the woman had stormed off with the chocolate bar.
